\u201cThe World Movers\u201d, our quarterly interactive newsletter is back to celebrate our strategic moves and important achievements over the last few months. This issue features exciting news and our recently established services, together with an interview with Christopher Schnieders, Global Director Projects and Marcel Kirschnick, Director, FLS Logistics, on supply chain shifts in Southeast Asia.<\/p>","saveContent":"

wpPost.title: The World Movers – Newsletter Q2, 2023

seo.title: The World Movers - Newsletter Q2, 2023 - FLS
seo.opengraphTitle: The World Movers - Newsletter Q2, 2023 - FLS
seo.opengraphDescription: “The World Movers”, our quarterly interactive newsletter is back to celebrate our strategic moves and important achievements over the last few months. This issue features exciting news and our recently established services, together with an interview with Christopher Schnieders, Global Director Projects and Marcel Kirschnick, Director, FLS Logistics, on supply chain shifts in Southeast Asia.… Continue reading The World Movers – Newsletter Q2, 2023

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: “The World Movers”, our quarterly interactive newsletter is back to celebrate our strategic moves and important achievements over the last few months. This issue features exciting news and our recently established services, together with an interview with Christopher Schnieders, Global Director Projects and Marcel Kirschnick, Director, FLS Logistics, on supply chain shifts in Southeast Asia.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: Click here and have fun exploring our world: bit.ly/theworldmovers-Q2-2023.
